# 31. Magic Necklace (神奇项链) <font color=RED>(Buggy)</font>

**Description:**

龙神得到了一串项链，而且是金色传说(强化+18446744073709551616) (不是

项链由带有能量的魔法珍珠串成环状构成，能给使用者带来巨大的力量。每个魔法珍珠都有一个释放能量值 ![v 下標 和最大能量值 个魔法珍珠保持稳定？由于这个方案数可能很大，您只需要输出这个数字对 ![粗體字 998244353](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20xmlns%3Awrs%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.wiris.com%2Fxml%2Fcvs-extension%22%20height%3D%2219%22%20width%3D%2282%22%20wrs%3Abaseline%3D%2215%22%3E%3C%21--MathML%3A%20%3Cmath%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1998%2FMath%2FMathML%22%20style%3D%22font-family%3A%27Times%20New%20Roman%27%22%3E%3Cmn%20mathvariant%3D%22bold%22%3E998244353%3C%2Fmn%3E%3C%2Fmath%3E--%3E%3Cdefs%3E%3Cstyle%20type%3D%22text%2Fcss%22%2F%3E%3C%2Fdefs%3E%3Ctext%20font-family%3D%22Times%20New%20Roman%22%20font-size%3D%2216%22%20font-weight%3D%22bold%22%20text-anchor%3D%22middle%22%20x%3D%2240.5%22%20y%3D%2215%22%3E998244353%3C%2Ftext%3E%3C%2Fsvg%3E) 取模的结果就可以了。

 ps. 两种调整方法不同，当且仅当至少存在一个魔法珍珠，在两种方法中的释放能量值 ![v 下標 i](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20xmlns%3Awrs%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.wiris.com%2Fxml%2Fcvs-extension%22%20height%3D%2226%22%20width%3D%2214%22%20wrs%3Abaseline%3D%2215%22%3E%3C%21--MathML%3A%20%3Cmath%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1998%2FMath%2FMathML%22%20style%3D%22font-family%3A%27Times%20New%20Roman%27%22%3E%3Cmsub%3E%3Cmi%3Ev%3C%2Fmi%3E%3Cmi%3Ei%3C%2Fmi%3E%3C%2Fmsub%3E%3C%2Fmath%3E--%3E%3Cdefs%3E%3Cstyle%20type%3D%22text%2Fcss%22%2F%3E%3C%2Fdefs%3E%3Ctext%20font-family%3D%22Times%20New%20Roman%22%20font-size%3D%2216%22%20font-style%3D%22italic%22%20text-anchor%3D%22middle%22%20x%3D%224.5%22%20y%3D%2215%22%3Ev%3C%2Ftext%3E%3Ctext%20font-family%3D%22Times%20New%20Roman%22%20font-size%3D%2212%22%20font-style%3D%22italic%22%20text-anchor%3D%22middle%22%20x%3D%2210.5%22%20y%3D%2222%22%3Ei%3C%2Ftext%3E%3C%2Fsvg%3E) 不同。

 pps. 请务必注意**不考虑环的翻转同构和旋转同构**。比如当 ![n 等於 5 逗號 空格 K 等於 3](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20xmlns%3Awrs%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.wiris.com%2Fxml%2Fcvs-extension%22%20height%3D%2219%22%20width%3D%2279%22%20wrs%3Abaseline%3D%2215%22%3E%3C%21--MathML%3A%20%3Cmath%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1998%2FMath%2FMathML%22%20style%3D%22font-family%3A%27Times%20New%20Roman%27%22%3E%3Cmi%3En%3C%2Fmi%3E%3Cmo%3E%3D%3C%2Fmo%3E%3Cmn%3E5%3C%2Fmn%3E%3Cmo%3E%2C%3C%2Fmo%3E%3Cmo%3E%26%23xA0%3B%3C%2Fmo%3E%3Cmi%3EK%3C%2Fmi%3E%3Cmo%3E%3D%3C%2Fmo%3E%3Cmn%3E3%3C%2Fmn%3E%3C%2Fmath%3E--%3E%3Cdefs%3E%3Cstyle%20type%3D%22text%2Fcss%22%3E%40font-face%7Bfont-family%3A%27math10ebb3c113d02fd51a017c38df2%27%3Bsrc%3Aurl%28data%3Afont%2Ftruetype%3Bcharset%3Dutf-8%3Bbase64%%2F%2FAAAALAA9%2F%2F%2F%2F1f%2FFAAEAAAAAAAAAAAFUAywAgAEAAFYAKgJYAh4BDgEsAiwAWgGAAoAAoADUAIAAAAAAAAAAKwBVAIAAqwDVAQABKwAHAAAAAgBVAAADAAOrAAMABwAAMxEhESUhESFVAqv9qwIA%2FgADq%2FxVVQMAAAEAVf9kANUAgAAKAAAzNTMVFAYHJz4BN1WALy8bHh4BgHo9URQpDjQxAAIAgADrAtUCFQADAAcAZRgBsAgQsAbUsAYQsAXUsAgQsAHUsAEQsADUsAYQsAc8sAUQsAQ8sAEQsAI8sAAQsAM8ALAIELAG1LAGELAH1LAHELAB1LABELAC1LAGELAFPLAHELAEPLABELAAPLACELADPDEwEyE1IR0BITWAAlX9qwJVAcBV1VVVAAEAAAABAADVeM5BXw889QADBAD%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F1joTc%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FWOhNzAAD%2FIASAA6sAAAAKAAIAAQAAAAAAAQAAA%2Bj%2FagAAF3AAAP%%2BgAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAuQcRAACNhRgAsgAAABUUE7EAAT8%3D%29format%28%27truetype%27%29%3Bfont-weight%3Anormal%3Bfont-style%3Anormal%3B%7D%3C%2Fstyle%3E%3C%2Fdefs%3E%3Ctext%20font-family%3D%22Times%20New%20Roman%22%20font-size%3D%2216%22%20font-style%3D%22italic%22%20text-anchor%3D%22middle%22%20x%3D%224.5%22%20y%3D%2215%22%3En%3C%2Ftext%3E%3Ctext%20font-family%3D%22math10ebb3c113d02fd51a017c38df2%22%20font-size%3D%2214%22%20text-anchor%3D%22middle%22%20x%3D%2217.5%22%20y%3D%2215%22%3E%3D%3C%2Ftext%3E%3Ctext%20font-family%3D%22Times%20New%20Roman%22%20font-size%3D%2216%22%20text-anchor%3D%22middle%22%20x%3D%2229.5%22%20y%3D%2215%22%3E5%3C%2Ftext%3E%3Ctext%20font-family%3D%22math10ebb3c113d ![K](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20xmlns%3Awrs%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.wiris.com%2Fxml%2Fcvs-extension%22%20height%3D%2219%22%20width%3D%2214%22%20wrs%3Abaseline%3D%2215%22%3E%3C%21--MathML%3A%20%3Cmath%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1998%2FMath%2FMathML%22%20style%3D%22font-family%3A%27Times%20New%20Roman%27%22%3E%3Cmi%3EK%3C%2Fmi%3E%3C%2Fmath%3E--%3E%3Cdefs%3E%3Cstyle%20type%3D%22text%2Fcss%22%2F%3E%3C%2Fdefs%3E%3Ctext%20font-family%3D%22Times%20New%20Roman%22%20font-size%3D%2216%22%20font-style%3D%22italic%22%20text-anchor%3D%22middle%22%20x%3D%226.5%22%20y%3D%2215%22%3EK%3C%2Ftext%3E%3C%2Fsvg%3E) 时，有多少保持稳定的方案。

**Output:**

样例解释：

**Example:**

- Input:

```

```

- Output:

```

```
